thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 08 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-MEG Energy Posts Q4 Loss Per Share $‍0.00​

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-MEG Energy Posts Q4 Loss Per Share $‍0.00​
text:
Feb 8 (Reuters) - MEG Energy Corp:
* MEG ENERGY REPORTS STRONG FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL-YEAR 2017 RESULTS
* MEG ENERGY CORP - ‍Q4 PRODUCTION VOLUMES OF 90,228 BARRELS PER DAY​
* MEG ENERGY CORP - ‍IN 2018, FOCUS IS ON SUCCESSFUL COMPLETION OF PHASE 2B EMSAGP PROGRAM AND GROWTH PLANS BEYOND 100,000 BPD​
* MEG ENERGY CORP QTRLY LOSS PER SHARE $‍0.00​ * MEG ENERGY CORP QTRLY ‍ADJUSTED FUNDS FLOW FROM OPERATIONS $0.65 PER SHARE​
* MEG ENERGY CORP - ‍SALES VOLUMES IN Q4 OF 2017 WERE ABOUT 4,300 BPD HIGHER THAN Q4 PRODUCTION VOLUMES​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
